entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:26 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 08:31 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snow level near valley bottom. Snowfall amount 10 cm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
